name: Nightwatchman
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn you are the Nightwatchman.

legacy.otherNightReminder: If the Nightwatchman has not used their ability: The Nightwatchman either shows a 'no' head shake or points to a player. Wake that player and show the Nightwatchman token, then point to the Nightwatchman.
